preqs: Students must have passed BTC1110 or equivalent before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {BTC1110} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-4, 10, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {AAF2180, BTC3200%, BTC3204, TBC2180}

description: Aspects of the legal and regulatory environment that affects financial decisions, transactions and relationships. Includes the laws regulating financial institutions and the banker/customer relationship; cheques; electronic payments; bills of exchange; bank lending, business finance and security; consumer credit; guarantees and bankruptcy.
